name: Ozzie Pozzie Backpackers
description:
This clean, spacious getaway offers great facilities at an affordable cost: a large outdoor swimming pool with surrounding sun lounge garden, BBQ area, big communal kitchen, relaxing reading room, TV cave with Netflix, games room and table tennis. Free WIFI in the common areas keeps you connected and online. 
Tired of cramped city hostels? Check out Ozzie Pozzie! Being the most spacious hostel in town we are more like a resort than a hostel. Offering the widest range of rooms from ensuite private rooms to dorms we accommodate any type of traveler and budget. With only 60 beds our hostel is just the right size to socialize in a relaxed beachy atmosphere or chill out and unwind in one of our cosy hammocks.
Another bonus is our great location only a 10-minute walk from the city center and the Greyhound bus station.
Our check-out time is not before 11am, awesome isn't it ? 

Learn to surf for only $45 or jump on the boat to spot whales and much more. For the adrenaline amateurs, sky diving jet skiing is also available. 
Getting around is easy and if you don't feel like walking just hire a bike with us ($15/day) or take the bus. Or go by foot and enjoy the stunning seaside scenery on the 8 km coastal walk.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
For cancellations of all or part of the group booking: 
- More than 8 days before arrival: 90%
- Within 7 days of arrival: No refund.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
The group leader must agree to ensure that their group will abide by the Ozzie Pozzie – YHA requirements listed below and any reasonable instructions made by the hostel manager or staff. The group leader must undertake: 
1.	To accept responsibility for proven damage or loss caused by the group to hostel building or equipment including safety and security systems and to recompense Ozzie Pozzie – YHA for any such loss or damage. 
2.	To abide by the conditions of payment for a booking, including the cancellation policy as detailed above. 
3.	To ensure that any children in the group are supervised at all times. Children must be supervised in public areas that includes swimming pool. 
4.	To agree that Ozzie Pozzie – YHA does not accept responsibility for accidents which may occur to any group member, or for any damage or theft of property whilst using the hostels? 
5.	Not to drink alcohol excessively at the hostel. If members of the group are under 18, to agree not to bring alcohol onto the hostel premises or to return to the premises in an intoxicated state. Leaders are particularly responsible for ensuring any group member under 18 years of age abides by YHA's policies baring smoking and consumption of alcohol. 
6.	To follow all other specific requests of the hostel management.

houseRules.notes:
Avoid the hustle of checking-in during office hours !
We offer self check-in service from 1 pm onwards.

Walk up the driveway and turn right to reception.
Once you're facing the reception door, the kiosk machine is on your left.
You can simply follow the prompt on the touch screen.

- Click on pre-booked guest
- Enter your last name
- Enter either your phone number or your reservation number

They key will then drop at the bottom of the machine.
Please wait a couple of seconds, the screen will display a map of the hostel with your room number highlighted.

Reception opens at 9 am and check-out is at 11 am at the latest.

If you are leaving before 9 am, simply drop your key in the 'Key Return' box on the left side of the kiosk.
